label: Shelter Press

description:
Blizzard-in-a-workshop, singeli-noise styles from Vladislav Delay, committing his noisy ass to Planet Mu after an acclaimed bout of footwork under his lesser-spotted name Ripatti in ’21

label: RECOLLECTION GRM
description:
Onetime GRM research director and electro-acoustic composer Daniel Teruggi takes a maiden bow on Recollection GRM with the first vinyl edition of his elementally-focussed 1983-89 works, as issued on CD in 1993 and now pressed on vinyl for the first time, newly mastered by Giuseppe Ielasi.

label: Peak Oil
description:
Ufff - this one's been a bit of a holy grail for DT heads since it originally dropped back in 2013. Clouded ghosts of techno, 'ardkore, glitch and fractal ambient are blurred into rhythmic throbs of potential energy and stifled emotion. One for fans of Pendant, William Basinski, Jan Jelinek, et al.
